    CopyOperation :: struct {
	cmd:         DrawCommand,
	text_offset: i32,
	glyph_font:  ^Font,
	glyph_index: u32,
	src:         sdl3.Rect,
	dst:         sdl3.Rect,
	reserved:    rawptr,
}

	NOOP, 
	FILL,

    DrawOperation :: struct #raw_union {
	cmd:  DrawCommand,
	fill: FillOperation,
	copy: CopyOperation,
}

    GPUAtlasDrawSequence Â¶
    Source

    GPUAtlasDrawSequence :: struct {
	atlas_texture: ^sdl3.GPUTexture,
	xy:            [^]sdl3.FPoint `fmt:"v,num_vertices"`,
	uv:            [^]sdl3.FPoint `fmt:"v,num_vertices"`,
	num_vertices:  i32,
	indices:       [^]i32 `fmt:"v,num_indices"`,
	num_indices:   i32,
	image_type:    ImageType,
	next:          ^GPUAtlasDrawSequence,
}

    Hinting Â¶
    Source

    Hinting :: enum i32 {
	INVALID        = -1, 
	NORMAL, 
	LIGHT, 
	MONO, 
	NONE, 
	LIGHT_SUBPIXEL, 
}
     

    NOTE: This is called TTF_HintingFlags but its not a bit_set so the "flags" doesn't really make sense, its just the hinting.

    SubStringFlags Â¶
    Source

    SubStringFlags :: distinct bit_field u32 {
	direction:  u8 | 8,
	text_start: bool | 1,
	line_start: bool | 1,
	line_end:   bool | 1,
	text_end:   bool | 1,
}

    TextData Â¶
    Source

    TextData :: struct {
	font:                ^Font,
	color:               sdl3.FColor,
	needs_layout_update: bool,
	layout:              ^TextLayout,
	x:                   i32,
	y:                   i32,
	w:                   i32,
	h:                   i32,
	num_ops:             i32,
	ops:                 [^]DrawOperation `fmt:"v,num_ops"`,
	num_clusters:        i32,
	clusters:            [^]SubString `fmt:"v,num_clusters"`,
	props:               sdl3.PropertiesID,
	needs_engine_update: bool,
	engine:              ^TextEngine,
	engine_text:         rawptr,
}

    TextEngine :: struct {
	version:     u32,
	userdata:    rawptr,
	CreateText:  proc "c" (userdata: rawptr, text: ^Text) -> bool,
	DestroyText: proc "c" (userdata: rawptr, Textext: ^Text),
}
